first_turn: {00001}Hello, this is {00002}Police Department Your son-in-law was arrested by us yesterday for prostitution. This incident is not a good thing. If you want many people to know, pay {00003} bail as soon as possible

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, {00002}Police: Your son-in-law was arrested for prostitution yesterday. Pay {00003} bail now.
What? Are you sure it's really my son-in-law? This must be a mistake!
Yes, ma'am. We have records and witnesses. You must pay {00003} quickly to avoid worse consequences.
Alright, please tell me how I can pay the bail immediately to resolve this.

first_turn: Hello, here is the manual customer service of {00004}. As the exam is approaching, I wonder if you need the exam questions. Can you fill in the link you sent you for a while and finish the reservation?

dialogue.text: Hello, this is manual customer service of {00004}. Exam coming, need exam questions? Please fill the sent link to reserve.
Oh, I didn't know about this service. Is it really from {00004}?
Yes, {00004} provides it. Just complete the link quickly to secure your exam questions.
